participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Passionate and dedicated to ballet, John is an artistic soul who values family support and strives for excellence in his craft.
participant_1.background: My mother is a ballerina. I plan to retire in 6 months. I have the support of my whole family. I've studied ballet all my life. I am a white dancer.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: James is an easy-going and friendly guy who enjoys outdoor activities and spending time with friends. He values physical fitness and enjoys watching sports.
participant_2.background: I work out every other day. I like to fly kites. My neighbor comes over all the time to watch rugby with me. My car broke down last week.

content.text: Hi, my name is John. I'm a ballerina.
Hi, John. I'm James. I like to fly kites.
That's cool. I've always wanted to learn how to fly a kite.
It's not hard. You just need to get a kite that's right for your skill level and find a good place to fly it.
I'll have to give it a try.
You should. It's a lot of fun.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to work out every other day. I also like to watch rugby with my neighbor.
That sounds like fun. I'm not much of a sports fan, but I like to work out too.
That's good. It's important to stay healthy.
I agree.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a ballerina. I've been studying ballet all my life.
That's really cool. I've never seen a ballerina in person.
You should come to see me perform sometime.
I'd love to.
I'm sure you'd enjoy it.
I'm sure I would.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a mechanic. I work on cars and trucks.
That's cool. I've always wanted to learn how to fix cars.
It's not hard. You just need to be patient and have a good understanding of how cars work.
I think I could be patient.
Well, if you ever want to learn, I'd be happy to teach you.
Thanks. I'll keep that in mind.
No problem.
